title: The Sound of Delight
description: Sigue a "Delight", un zorro con problemas de audici√≥n mientras lidia con el estigma de su discapacidad, en un mundo de magia y maravillas.

title: Tamales in Space
description: Tamales in Space offers a polished, feasible concept for a game deeply rooted in Aztec culture. Communicating story elements while also functioning as concept art and visual reference for future game elements. Connecting everything, from the color scheme of Tonatiuh, based on ancient manuscript.

title: Archie
description: Join Archie on a magical adventure! This project was brought to life by a passionate and talented team, each contributing their unique skills to create something truly special.
